detectors.description: Variable OpenAddressLottery.LuckyNumber (other/open_address_lottery/open_address_lottery.sol#11) is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in OpenAddressLottery.participate() (other/open_address_lottery/open_address_lottery.sol#17-33):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(win) (other/open_address_lottery/open_address_lottery.sol#28)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reseed(SeedComponents(uint256(block.coinbase),block.difficulty,block.gaslimit,block.timestamp)) (other/open_address_lottery/open_address_lottery.sol#31)
		- lastReseed = block.number (other/open_address_lottery/open_address_lottery.sol#39)
	- reseed(SeedComponents(uint256(block.coinbase),block.difficulty,block.gaslimit,block.timestamp)) (other/open_address_lottery/open_address_lottery.sol#31)
		- secretSeed = uint256(keccak256()(components.component1,components.component2,components.component3,components.component4)) (other/open_address_lottery/open_address_lottery.sol#38)
